meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tom Moosbrugger Ko Otaka Christopher Short Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6121.

td.p: Tom Moosbrugger, a library worker from Columbus, Ohio
Ko Otaka, a realtor from Washington, D.C.
Christopher Short, a pub trivia editor from Crawfordsville, Indiana (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,600)

tr.td: PLAY STATION
FACE BOOK
HANDHELD
AYE, "PAD"
ONLINE
JEOPARDY PLATFORMS
